description: Describes the monitoring configuration of the component.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

nested_items.name: Monitor
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the application component is monitored.

nested_items.name: Tier
nested_items.description: The tier of the application component. Supported tiers include DOT_NET_CORE, DOT_NET_WORKER, DOT_NET_WEB, SQL_SERVER, and DEFAULT.

nested_items.name: ComponentConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings of the component. The value is the escaped JSON of the configuration.
